name: FaceFight Challenge!
description:
Diffcat Game Studios presents FaceFight Challenge!, the latest viral game to use cutting-edge Mobile AR Graphics to bring 10X the fun and entertainment for users.

FaceFight Challenge! allows you to create hilarious moments with friends by joining real-time PVP matching with millions of people. It uses Mobile AR Graphics and your mobile phone camera to map your face. Apply hilarious face filters and throw epic weapons at the opponent's face. The faster you throw, the higher your score!

Hashtag #FaceFight or #FaceFightChallenge when sharing to join our community and activate challenge mode.

With FaceFight Challenge, you can:
◉ Play Realtime Multiplayer with your nickname & uploaded avatar
◉ Experience new AR technology with the fun of face fighting!
◉ Use cool and regularly updated Filters and Effects with your camera
◉ Record & share your Facefight videos to any social networks
◉ Challenge your friends and beat each other’s high scores.
◉ Fight & make friends with many cool people around the world.

FaceFight was created by Diffcat Studio from Vietnam.
Official Website of the Diffcat: http://www.diffcat.com
